description: Docker Swarm stacks and services metrics

targets.expr: sum(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[1m]) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) swarm_node_info{node_name=~"$node_name"}) * 100 / count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user"} * on(instance) group_left(node_name) swarm_node_info{node_name=~"$node_name"})

sum((node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) swarm_node_info{node_name=~"$node_name"} * 100) / count(swarm_node_info * on(instance) group_left(node_name) swarm_node_info{node_name=~"$node_name"})

sum((node_filesystem_free_bytes{ mountpoint="/"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint="/"}) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) swarm_node_info{node_name=~"$node_name"} * 100) / count(swarm_node_info * on(instance) group_left(node_name) swarm_node_info{node_name=~"$node_name"})

title: Docker Swarm Dashboard
